Protein Names: Bifunctional protein HldE [Includes: D-beta-D-heptose 7-phosphate kinase (EC 2.7.1.167) (D-beta-D-heptose 7-phosphotransferase) (D-glycero-beta-D-manno-heptose-7-phosphate kinase); D-beta-D-heptose 1-phosphate adenylyltransferase (EC 2.7.7.70) (D-glycero-beta-D-manno-heptose 1-phosphate adenylyltransferase)]
